benchmark_details.name: KG-LLM-Bench
benchmark_details.overview: KG-LLM-Bench is a comprehensive and extensible benchmark for evaluating how large language models (LLMs) process and understand textualized knowledge graphs, spanning five knowledge graph understanding tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To analyze how LLMs process and understand in-context knowledge graphs with five tasks covering important KG reasoning capabilities.

data.size: 3,552 core entities, 27,226 attribute entities, 11,361 core facts, 51,952 attribute facts
data.format: Structured JSON, List of Edges, Structured YAML, RDF Turtle, JSON-LD

methodology.calculation: Responses generated by the LLMs are evaluated against the ground truth using exact match scoring.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy scores indicate better performance in understanding and processing the presented knowledge graphs.
methodology.validation: The benchmark consists of five tasks with 100 instances each across different textualization strategies and seven models.
